example.title: Merging an Entity model with a Vocabulary model
example.description: This EML merging merges an Entity model with a Vocabulary model specifying the vocabulary used in an organization.

example.title: Generating a GraphViz graph from a MOF1.4 metamodel
example.description: This EOL program generates a textual representation of a graph that can be visualized using the Dot program of the Graphviz (www.graphviz.org) platform.

example.title: Transforming an Object Oriented model into a Relational Database model
example.description: This ETL transformation transforms an Object Oriented model into a Relational Database model. The type mappings between the OO and the DB metamodel are provided in a separate Type Mapping model.
